Action.author: jtclark
Action.body: The above patch set is is *MERGED*, but it does not address the task described here. Creating a new patch set to address the task at hand.

Action.author: jtclark
Action.body: ~rameshthoomu - can you confirm which third-party images need to be released as part of the release-1.0 branch for fabric-ca?

Action.author: jtclark
Action.body: After speaking with ~rameshthoomu about these two jobs, they are no longer required after the https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/23513 is *MERGED*.
